metadata.description:
As a little girl, Sangre witnessed the kidnapping of her mother and the slaughter of the rest of her family at the hands of the Company of Buccaneers. As the only survivor, she was sent to an institution where she learned to master the power of freezing time for a few seconds, before continuing her education in the school of the streets.
Sangre has but one dream: to find her mother and exact vengeance against the seven buccaneers who killed the rest of her family.
metadata.name: Sangre
